sources.title: Apache Iceberg: An Open Table Format for Huge Analytic Datasets
sources.synthesis: Iceberg provides ACID transactions, schema evolution, and time travel for large-scale analytics. Hidden partitioning eliminates user errors. Snapshot isolation enables reproducible reads.
sources.relevance: Core table format for silver/gold layers with audit trail capability

sources.title: Model Context Protocol (MCP) Specification v1.0
sources.synthesis: MCP enables tool-based interactions between LLMs and external systems via stdio/HTTP. Supports stateless request-response with JSON-RPC 2.0. Built-in error handling and capability negotiation.
sources.relevance: Foundation for multi-agent architecture with standardized tool interfaces

sources.title: MinIO High Performance Object Storage
sources.synthesis: MinIO provides S3-compatible object storage with erasure coding, bitrot protection, and encryption. Achieves 183 GB/s reads and 171 GB/s writes on standard hardware.
sources.relevance: Local S3-compatible storage for bronze/silver/gold data layers

sources.title: Trino: The Definitive Guide
sources.synthesis: Trino provides distributed SQL queries across heterogeneous data sources. Native Iceberg connector supports all table features including time travel and hidden partitions.
sources.relevance: SQL engine for querying Iceberg tables with federation capability

sources.title: Building Event-Driven Microservices with Apache Kafka
sources.synthesis: Event-driven architectures enable loose coupling and scalability. Change data capture patterns support incremental processing. Schema registry ensures compatibility.
sources.relevance: Future enhancement for real-time ESG score updates
